name: A Rat's Story
description:
You play as a tiny rat scavenging for food. But this isn't easy. You have to avoid getting crushed under a feet of some pedestrian. How much food can you collect without dying?

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 38 in 48 hours.

Instructions

Collect the food that the pedestrians drop on the floor. Dodge the foots and don't get killed by the steam ventilation.

You can walk to the left and the right with the arrow keys or the A and D keys.

Twitter: twitter.com/broodjepudding
